articles.title: Nearly 226,000 Covid-19 cases were reported in children last week, pediatrician group says - CNN
articles.description: Covid-19 infections have continued to increase "exponentially" among children across the US, and now account for nearly 26% of all cases reported nationwide, according to data published Monday.
articles.content: (CNN)Covid-19 infections have continued to increase "exponentially" among children across the US, and now account for nearly 26% of all cases reported nationwide, according to data published Monday.… [+2766 chars]
